description: a(0)=1, after which, for any n uniquely written as du*u! + ... + d2*2! + d1*1! (each di in range 0..i), a(n) = (du+1)*(u+1)! + ... + (d2+1)*3! + (d1+1)*2! + 1; the natural numbers with their factorial base representation (A007623) shifted left one step and each digit incremented by one, converted back to decimal.
